Franchise Importation

Solomon Max innovative think-tank (Village Knowledge) has created the first African Franchise Aggregator platform for brand creators and franchises around the globe to align with prospective African businesses, thereby creating the opportunity to start off the right way in the continent.

Solomon Max Franchise Importations (SMFI) is the platform for new brands seeking African presence to meet the genuine African investor. Global brands that are aimed and ready to deploy their brand for a win-win synergy in this ever robust emerging market now have a suitable platform that enables ease of entry into the ever-growing market that assures collective benefits of all interest in the global community where brands have become the rallying point of the One-World marketplace.

Visit our knowledge Village for data of our new franchise opportunities.
